siteMetadata.title: vwa.la help
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about the vwa.la influencer marketing platform.

ghostPost.title: URL for tags and authors returns 404 errors
ghostPost.excerpt: Ensure your routes.yaml file is properly configured for URLs for tags and authors.
ghostPost.meta_title: URL for tags and authors returns a 404 - Ghost - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Ensure your routes.yaml file is properly configured for URLs for tags and authors, or it will return 404 errors. Find out more about common errors!

primary_tag.name: Errors
primary_tag.description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!
primary_tag.meta_description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!

tags.name: Errors
tags.description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!
tags.meta_description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!

ghostPost.plaintext:
The tag  and author  taxonomies must be present in routes.yaml  otherwise the
URLs will not exist. By default, Ghost installs with the following:

taxonomies:
  tag: /tag/{slug}/
  author: /author/{slug}/


The permalink for tag  and author  can be amended, but taxonomies for tag  and 
author  must always be present for the URL for individual tags and authors to
function correctly.
ghostPost.html:
The tag and author taxonomies must be present in routes.yaml otherwise the URLs will not exist. By default, Ghost installs with the following:

taxonomies:
  tag: /tag/{slug}/
  author: /author/{slug}/

The permalink for tag and author can be amended, but taxonomies for tag and author must always be present for the URL for individual tags and authors to function correctly.
